title: Mix Circles Podcast
description:
Welcome to the Mix Circles Podcast. Here, I and those who appear on this podcast throw all titles, all skin colour, everything away, and focus on the least focused on part of life; Genuine conversation. Like the groups of older generations meeting at your local coffee shop, having a calm debate between two humans of different backgrounds… different upbringings… different perspectives. 
Now, for me “Mix”, I’m just an idiot, only trying to make it through life, one day better then the last one, one day at a time. I’m a Millennial, not by choice, but because I’m swept into that pile. I come from a cadet background (Royal Canadian Air Cadets), and I DO NOT back down to those who challenge my views/beliefs. BUT, I am just a licensed bodyman from Canada, with possibly some mental disconnections. Honestly, just a nobody that has surprised himself as to how he has gotten this far in his life, when people used to tell him the cliché terms like you’re “no good”, “worthless”, “stupid”, “weirdo”; that you’re just stupid and will not succeed. Battling himself, trying to find the “meaning of life”. If you’re like me, you often find yourself alone, asking. ”What is the correct way to think/interact? Why are humans here? How did we come to be? What is the REAL TRUTH? Is it Science, Is it Religion? Where are we going? Who will lead us? Who will lead us humans to greatness? But, aren’t we all just that? Human. So why not come along for the ride, be human, come join my discussion circle, have a coffee or tea, and let’s talk; Shall we?
Some of you, are probably asking, but WHO is this guy? For privacy reasons, I wish for my identity to stay private. I do not wish for fame. YES I DO NOT WISH FOR FAME. I don’t wish to be worldwide know. I just want people to LISTEN TO THE PODCAST. I am merely just using this platform as all AMAZING podcasters do (on this amazing service), Just as a meeting point, to discuss views and have a good discussion, to take a step back from life (stop to smell the roses), just relax, have a conversation about whatever comes to mind and not have to worry about "Nae-Sayers". Focus on genuine conversation between two humans.

title: Papers Aloud
description:
This podcasts features readings of open-access (CC BY) primary research articles and reviews relevant to evolutionary and cell biology, environmental and clinical microbiology, symbiosis, geobiology, and bioinformatics. 


I avoid Methods sections, and sometimes Results (depending on how amenable it is to reading out loud). Abstract, Introduction, Discussion, and Conclusions are always included.


If you are an author of a research article and would like to have your work converted to an audio format, or send me an audio recording of your paper, please reach out to rkdgarber@gmail.com.

Jones, MD, a board certified physician in Gastroenterology and Internal Medicine who is a former Professor of Medicine at Virginia Commonwealth University with previous academic appointments at Northwestern University, the University of Cincinnati, Wright State University and Uniformed Services University of Health Sciences. Dr. Jones has over 35 years experience in patient care, research, teaching and administration. 

A wide variety of guests from the world of medicine, healthcare, fitness nutrition and the arts join us to discuss topics to help make your life healthier, happier, fuller and more balanced. 

Our well-being is our responsibility. In these challenging times, we need to promote community over divisiveness, nurture and support one another and do our best to maintain our health and well being to avoid becoming a casualty of the our for-profit health care system. Join us, and we'll help you do just that!

What should I be doing to protect my livelihood and well-being? To answer these important questions and many more, join Layla Ahmadi, an aspiring physician and medical correspondent with a B.A. in Biochemistry and Global Health, to better understand the things about the COVID-19 pandemic they won't talk about on the news. Layla frequently collaborates with guest speakers on episodes who are experts in fields of medicine, public health, finance and many others. title: JOONAS - Jongeren en Ouders Ondersteunen NA Scheiding
description:
“Wat is het belang van het kind? Wat is de rol van het parket bij een scheiding? Wat is levend verlies bij scheiding? Wat vertellen kinderen en jongeren aan AWEL over de scheiding van hun ouders? Maar ook .. wat zijn risico en beschermende factoren voor kinderen en jongeren? Wanneer en hoe zet je best bemiddeling in? Wat is ouderverstoting en hoe herken je het?" Dat èn zoveel meer… 
In JOONAS, de podcast waarmee we Jongeren en Ouders willen Ondersteunen NA Scheiding draait elke aflevering om één centrale vraag. Rond die centrale vraag gaan wij open, maar kritisch in gesprek met een deskundige uit hulpverlening en/of justitiële wereld èn getuigen ervaringsdeskundigen via geluidsfragmenten over hun ervaringen. 
JOONAS is een initiatief van psycholoog en psychotherapeut Vanessa Maes en familiaal bemiddelaar - advocaat Sophie Vanhemmens.
Hun doel? dat zit in de naam… jongeren en ouders ondersteunen na een scheiding… door erkenning en herkenning te bieden in de vele verhalen uit de 2 werelden: die van hulpverlening en die van justitie. 
Wil je ook getuigen? Wil je ons helpen bij het maken van deze podcast? Tips? Reacties? Vragen?
Meer weten of ons volgen? 
Facebookpagina: https://www.facebook.com/joonasdepodcast
Instagrampagina: https://instagram.com/joonas_depodcast
Wil je ons steunen? 
Dan mag dit integraal gaan naar AWEL. Voor onze kinderen en jongeren. Dit mag op het rekeningnummer: BE63 0689 3013 1108. Alvast bedankt!

title: SCI Science Perspectives
description:
The American Spinal Injury Association (ASIA) brings you SCI Science Perspectives. The podcast is built around two-part dialogues with spinal cord injury (SCI) professionals regarding their emerging scientific work spanning the full spectrum of SCI research, from discovery to clinical application. 

The SCI Science Perspectives podcast disseminates the latest-and-greatest scientific work in the SCI field via a conversation with researchers that approaches their work from two perspectives: the “scholarly” perspective and the “community” perspective. The process begins with ASIA’s Committees informing the podcast about new and influential scientific papers relevant to the committee’s interests. Then the podcast host(s) then interview the author(s) of the papers, approaching their project from each perspective. Finally, the conversation from each perspective is published as its own episode type: "Scholarly" and "Community" episodes. Keep an eye out too for "Admin" episodes too, communicating administrative information relevant to ASIA members and stakeholders.

title: Science Society
description:
We invite you to dive into the world of science and discovery, where knowledge knows no bounds. This podcast series aims to bring together a diverse array of scientists, researchers, and thought leaders who are at the forefront of their respective fields. From astrophysics to zoology, climate science to genetics, each episode explores groundbreaking research and innovative insights, providing listeners with a firsthand look at the progress shaping our world.

Our conversations stretch beyond the confines of laboratories and research papers. They venture into the significance and societal impact of these discoveries, the intriguing challenges scientists face, and the stories behind their aha! moments. Each week, a distinguished guest brings their latest findings to the table, making complex concepts accessible and engaging for both science enthusiasts and the scientifically curious.

Whether you are a science professional seeking to keep abreast of the latest breakthroughs or a curious mind wanting to better understand the world around you, "Breakthrough Dialogues" serves as your window into the fascinating world of scientific discovery. Tune in to stay informed, get inspired, and join the journey toward the future of science.

description:

title: The Cavefish Chronicles
description:
Understanding how the same fish could look so different is a question that scientists have been investigating since the discovery of the blind Mexican cavefish, Astyanax Mexicanus in the 1930’s. The cave fish, pale pink without eyes, lives in underground caves below its surface cousin which is silvery gray with black eyes. Today Astyanax is a model to study genetics, disease and behavior.

The story includes jungle explorers braving plane crashes and venomous snakes to find the cavefish and the scientists who studied it including a renowned German professor who fled Nazi Germany and a female Turkish scientist, Perihan Sadoglu who did some of the first genetic work in the 1950’s, but who mysteriously disappeared mid-career. The podcast follows the stories of scientists past and present revealing clues along the way to find out what had happened to Dr. Sadoglu and why it matters now.

title: Pokeology 101
description:
Welcome to Pokelogy 101!
These lectures are taught by Professor Reed and Professor Lee who are colleagues with Professor Rowan studying Pokemon Evolution. Specifically, we study why Pokemon evolve and how they are related to each other. For example why is a Greninja form a clade with Politoad, but not Seismitoad? Who is Dunsparce and Shuckle's closest relative? All this and more discussed here!

title: Goggles On! with JEI
description:
Goggles On! with JEI is from the Journal of Emerging Investigators with host Scott Soldat-Valenzuela, Executive Director. We dive into science and STEM conversations with young scientists, experienced professionals and, frankly, anyone who contributes to the development of scientists in the United States. 

The Journal of Emerging Investigators is an open-access journal that publishes original research in the biological and physical sciences that is written by middle and high school students.  JEI provides students, under the guidance of a teacher or advisor, the opportunity to submit and gain feedback on original research and to publish their findings in a peer-reviewed scientific journal. Because grade-school students often lack access to formal research institutions, we expect that the work submitted by students may come from classroom-based projects, science fair projects, or other forms of mentor-supervised research.

title: Shaver Cancer Charity Chat
description:
“Shaver Cancer Charity Chat” is a Monthly Podcast with Hosts Roseann Giovanatto-Shaver and Heather Austin. Together, they share their decades of thoughtful work with Minnesota’s Cancer Community.  Their discussions will include the history of The Randy Shaver Cancer Research and Community Fund, insights on cancer, upcoming local fundraising efforts and the latest Minnesota based research and Community Programs.
Enjoy easy, reflective, considerate and witty interviews with many of Minnesota’s best in the area of cancer.

title: Vi bliver mennesker - en Podcast serie om at være menneske sammen
description:
Find et godt sted for dig at lytte med. 
Måske på din vej gennem byen, måske et stille sted hvor unger og andre små og store behovsdyr ikke kan nå dig. 
Måske i en pause fra noget af det, livet er fyldt med, og som du glæder dig til at vende tilbage til når du har lyttet

Dit sted. Dit tempo. Din plads. Der hvor du har det lækkert. 
Denne podcast må gerne nydes. Det hele er til dig.
Fordi den handler om dig. Og den handler om os. Hvordan vi er mennesker. Sammen.

Velkommen på tur i det lækre, det grimme, det svære og det nære i det at være menneske; alene og sammen. 

I den her serie vil jeg sammen med en flok dejlige mennesker undersøge hvordan vi kan bruge Human Design, astrologien, vores måder at relatere på gennem nervesystemet og alt det sjove og besværlige bagage vi har med fra gode og dårlige tider i vores liv.

Vi bliver mennesker - En Podcast serie om at være menneske sammen 


Vil du vide mere så findes jeg på insta: 
kristabellamidwife

Og Facebook:
www.facebook.com/humandesigninmotion


For en læsning kontakt mig på humandesigninmotion@gmail.com

title: SDRS (Swine Disease Reporting System) Podcast
description:
The Swine Disease Reporting System (SDRS) consists of multiple projects that aggregate data from participating veterinary diagnostic laboratories (VDLs) in the United States of America. 
Through this podcast, our investigators and invited guests summarize the key information on endemic and emerging diseases affecting the swine population in the USA, assisting veterinarians and producers to make informed decisions on disease prevention, detection, and management.

title: Stories from the Mortuary
description: Welcome to the Mortuary! Here you can find death and true crime as told by a mortuary science student. Have a morbid curiosity?  Let's take a candid look at death together.

title: B jak biologia
description:
W podcaście B jak biologia opowiadam sobie wesoło o, a jakże, biologii. Zdobędziecie tu wiedzę na temat świata ożywionego w przystępny sposób. Czasem się tu denerwuję, czasem sobie pożartuję, często się zachwycam. Nie obiecam Wam, że lepszy będzie świat, jednak mogę obiecać, że będzie tu całkiem luźno i przyjemnie. 

Jeśli chcecie popatrzeć sobie na zdjęcia roślin czy grzybów, nauczyć się ich nazw i nie tylko, to zapraszam na mój Instagram: @zamollony

title: You Make Me Sick!
description: You Make Me Sick! is a look at pathogenic microorganisms, their unique characteristics, history, epidemiology and treatments.

title: Let's Paws
description:
A podcast about the past, present, and future of oncology in both human and veterinary medicine hosted by me, a radiation therapist who has been in the field for a total of 15 years and counting... (10 years in human medicine and 5 years in veterinary)

I will talk to those who practice in radiation, medical and surgical oncology on both the human and veterinary sides. 

To send topics or to be a guest, email me at letspawspodcast@gmail.com or follow me on Instagram @letspawspodcast

title: Proefdiervrij de Podcast: we zijn verder dan je denkt
description:
Het gebruik van proefdieren in de wetenschap is niet nieuw. Maar in een tijdperk van zelfrijdende auto’s en commerciële ruimtereizen, vragen wij ons toch af… hoe lang moeten dieren het nog ontgelden in de naam van de wetenschap?

Proefdiervrij de Podcast is dé podcast over proefdieren en vooral over hoe we die zo mogelijk de wereld uitkrijgen. Collega’s Saskia en Romy dagen elke maand een andere proefdiervrije pionier uit om ons te laten zien dat Nederland zonder die vreselijke dierproeven kan. Wat is er nodig voor een proefdiervrije wereld? En moeten we het niet eens gaan hebben over een dierproevenverbod? Dit (en nog veel meer) bespreken we elke laatste vrijdag van de maand om 16.00 uur in Proefdiervrij de Podcast.

title: Vision 2025
description:
Hoe ziet de apotheek van de toekomst eruit? Wat doet de apotheker voor patiënten in 2025? Eén ding is zeker: #OurFutureIsBright!
In deze podcastreeks gaan we op ontdekking in de Vision 2025 en bespreken we allerlei toekomstpistes.
Abonneer je op deze podcast en de volgende aflevering verschijnt automatisch in je feed – handig, niet?!
Meer info: vision2025@apb.be
____________________________________________________________________________________

À quoi ressemblera la pharmacie du futur ? Que feront les pharmaciens pour leurs patients en 2025 ? Une chose est sûre : #OurFutureIsBright!
Dans cette série de podcasts exclusifs, nous explorons la Vision 2025 et abordons différentes pistes d’avenir.

Abonnez-vous et le prochain podcast apparaîtra automatiquement dans votre flux ! Pratique, non ?

title: IdealMente
description: Por que entender nuestra mente y emociones no es siempre lo que esperamos o necesitamos, pero tampoco son monstruos que existan para hacernos daño. La promoción y comprensión de la salud mental es esencial para una vida plena.
author_name: Paloma de la Luz Hernández Siordia

title: Journal Club ULVF
description: V Journal Club-u ULVF spremljamo in komentiramo najnovejše znanstvene raziskave in dosežke na področju veterinarske medicine. Občasno ponovimo tudi osnove veterinarskih postopkov. Za vse veterinarje in ostalo zainteresirano javnost, ker številnim novostim najlažje sledimo skupaj.

title: #BlackInCompBio
description:
The Black Women in Computational Biology Network is accelerating opportunity at the intersection of biology, math, and computer science globally. With over 240 members from 4 continents, we increase opportunities for collaboration, professional development, and science communication to change the face of integrative biosciences across the globe.

The #BlackInCompBio series highlights Black computational biologists of all genders and professional stages and their stories. We use this platform to bridge the gap in representation and access to professional inspiration in the field.

BWCB Website

Donate to BWCB

title: Talkin' About Pigs
description: Welcome to “Talkin About Pigs” with SMEC – a podcast where individuals from the Swine Medicine Education Center discuss swine health topics over coffee. Each podcast covers a different swine health topic of interest to pork producers. All topics are generated from producer submitted questions. We keep the topic producer oriented, with the goal of bringing pork producers relevant information that they can bring back to the farm.

title: Buggin Out
description: Hi! And welcome to “Buggin’ out” A podcast dedicated to all things creepy and crawly. I’m your host Tyler Wiedmeyer a Entomology Master’s student at the University of Delaware here to take you on a journey to the world of insects, arachnids, and all the rest of the ‘bugs’.

title: The Journey of Science
description: A podcast about scientists for everyone. Gopu and Zane talks to early career scientists around the world about their science, journey, mistakes and directions. Do join us in humanising scientists and making science more accessible.

title: Random Gab
description:
All you need to know here is, what goes on the head and never comes outta mouth ; will come out here. Sometimes gossip, sometimes advice ,sometimes random shit and sometimes just nothing at all. Me and my bff are going to chat about all teen drama , life, arguments, growing up, annoyances and BEYOND. 
Nothing is off limits. So,
"Buck Up, Sissy pants!" we're in a comfort of our own self to bitch about it all.

title: Easy Medizin Podcast mit Kauveh P
description: Im deutschsprachigem Raum gibt es bist jetzt keine Podcasts, die komplett dem M2 Staatsexamen gewidmet sind. Hier ist eure Chance euch bite-size Wiederholungen zu den wichtigsten Themen fürs M2 kostenlos anzuhören! Werdet Fit fürs M2!

title: Going Within with Sheena & Jenn
description: "Going Within" Podcast was Created by Sheena C. And Jennifer B to discuss living in   spirituality and going within one's self to search for the answers to some of life's  most complex and complicated questions. Join in as we dive in together into the sea of knowledge, wisdom and understanding.

title: The Nervous Podcast
description:
Let's explore the most complex structure in the universe, the nervous system - aka you.
The objective functions, processes - subjective perceptions, experiences; and all the controversial theories in-between.

title: Heme.Onco.Mania
description: Data is not enough to answer our questions without the perspective of experts. We envision our podcast platform hosting outstanding experts, leaders, and frontiers in oncology fields will train our perspectives.

title: Diving Into Diabetes
description:
The world of diabetes management is constantly evolving, with new research, new treatments, and new recommendations for best practice. Diving into Diabetes is a series of in-depth conversations with experts who are on the front lines of diabetes research and management. We're starting the conversation with those who are committed to improving and individualizing diabetes treatment to help provide important information and insight for fellow healthcare professionals keen to target the needs of their patients. This podcast is intended for healthcare professionals only. Speaker disclosures are available in each episode’s notes. The views and opinions expressed in this program are those of the speakers and do not necessarily reflect the views or positions of any entities they represent. Some information contained herein may cite the use of an unapproved product in a dosage, for an indication, or in a manner other than recommended. Before prescribing any product, always refer to the latest Product Monograph. Financial support for the Diving Into Diabetes program was provided by Sanofi Canada.

title: Plan Amora -  el poder siempre estuvo dentro de ti
description: Un podcast de la vida y diferentes cosas que he aprendido en el camino de volver a mi

title: Le point sur le diabète
description:
Les nouvelles études, les nouveaux traitements, les nouvelles recommandations sur les pratiques exemplaires nous forcent à revoir sans cesse nos stratégies de prise en charge du diabète. Le point sur le diabète est une série d’entretiens approfondis avec des experts directement concernés par la recherche et la prise en charge du diabète. Nous commencerons nos échanges avec les personnes qui travaillent à améliorer et à personnaliser le traitement du diabète et nous espérons apporter ainsi un complément d’information utile et un nouvel éclairage à nos collègues soucieux de répondre aux besoins de leurs patients. Ce balado est destiné aux professionnels de la santé uniquement. Les déclarations sur les conflits d’intérêts potentiels se trouvent dans les notes de chaque épisode. Les points de vue et les opinions exprimés dans le cadre de ce programme sont ceux des conférenciers et ne reflètent pas nécessairement les points de vue ou les opinions des entités qu’ils représentent. Le programme « Le point sur le diabète » bénéficie d’une aide financière de Sanofi Canada.

MAT-CA-2200968

title: Real Addiction Talk
description: Real Addiction Talk is an unfiltered podcast that focuses on creating positive change for those who are currently struggling with an active addiction, are in recovery, or just want more information about the addiction field. We provide up-to-date content, research, techniques, education, and resources for our listeners. The podcast is hosted by James Gibbons, M.A., IADC who is also in recovery from an addiction and has been sober for over 10 years. He has spent the last decade researching, studying, and helping those with an addiction in his community. James recently received his Master’s degree from the University of South Dakota in Addiction Counseling with co-occurring disorder specialization. Check out our website at realaddictiontalk.com for more information and to sign up for our newsletters.

title: Builders of Biotech
description: Builders of Biotech is a show about innovation in the biotech sector, told through the experiences of industry experts and influential scientists. Host Lucas Carter investigates scientific breakthroughs with the people who made them happen, making sure to appreciate the technical wonder and human element of each discovery. Join us for stories from biotech that are informative, personal, and always fascinating.

title: Thats Not What I Said
description: Open conversations and positive perspective to enhance your life. Come join us as we look at lifes most impactful issues with both Kings and Queens to invoke a better understanding.

title: Body Banter
description: Welcome to Body Banter, a podcast where we explore different perspectives of the human body in all its forms! Our hosts, Dr. Claudia Krebs and Dr. Segun Oyedele, are joined by an amazing line up of guests to share their expertise and thoughts about what the human body means to them. Our guests come from all over the world and include researchers, clinicians, anatomy instructors, scholars of language and culture, and people with lived experiences navigating the healthcare system. Anatomy is for everybody and every body, and we are here to get the body banter going!

title: Diagnexia Dialogues
description:
Diagnexia is an international Pathology Services company with facilities in Chicago, Dublin and Exeter UK. 

Its’ mission is to improve patient experience by improving turnaround time for diagnoses. It helps hospitals balance case workload & remove backlogs by connecting them to a Global Virtual Pathology team via the Diagnexia platform. 

Our podcast series touches on topics like the future of pathology, innovation, digital pathology in particular, impact on practice, use of diagnostic algorithms, pressures/challenges confronting pathology across the world in the next 5-10 years and how do we position ourselves to combat these challenges.

title: Listen to Your Heart
description:
Advances in cardiovascular care are continuously being made, with new research, new treatments, and new recommendations for best practice. Listen to Your Heart is a series of in-depth conversation with experts who are at the forefront of cardiovascular research and medicine—preventing, diagnosing, and treating cardiovascular disease for better patient outcomes. We're starting the conversation with those who are committed to improving heart health for all, and to help provide important information and insight for fellow healthcare professionals keen to target the needs of their patients, particularly those at high-risk for cardiovascular disease. This podcast is intended for healthcare professionals only. Speaker disclosures are available in each episode’s notes. The views and opinions expressed in this program are those of the speakers and do not necessarily reflect the views or positions of any entities they represent. Some information contained here may cite the use of an unapproved product in a dosage, for an indication, or in a manner other than recommended. Before prescribing any product always refer to the latest Product Monograph. Financial support for the Listen to Your Heart program was provided by Sanofi Canada.

title: Sub 10
description: Sub 10 is a show created by Coach Mike from Melbourne Fitness & Performance, which is all about high performance. If you want a show that is entertaining, informative and straigth to the point Sub 10 is for you. 10 minutes epsiodes of the latest information and concepts to live and develop a high performance lifestyle and learn the secrets to athletic performane training. Once a month we will feature an amazing guest who will share the secrets to their success.

title: Écoutez votre cœur
description:
Des progrès sont constamment réalisés dans le domaine des soins cardiovasculaires : nouveaux travaux de recherche, nouveaux traitements et nouvelles recommandations de pratiques exemplaires. Écoutez votre cœur est une série de discussions approfondies avec des experts qui sont à la pointe de la recherche et de la médecine cardiovasculaires – pour prévenir, diagnostiquer et traiter les maladies cardiovasculaires afin d’améliorer les résultats pour les patients. Les intervenants avec qui nous discuterons sont déterminés à améliorer la santé cardiaque de la population et souhaitent faire part d’importants renseignements et de leurs réflexions aux autres professionnels de la santé désireux de cibler les besoins de leurs patients, en particulier ceux qui présentent un risque élevé de maladie cardiovasculaire. Ce balado est destiné aux professionnels de la santé uniquement. Les divulgations des renseignements sur les intervenants ont été ajoutées aux notes de chaque épisode. Les points de vue et opinions exprimés dans ce programme sont ceux des intervenants et ne reflètent pas nécessairement les points de vue ou positions des entités qu’ils représentent. Certains renseignements contenus dans le présent programme peuvent mentionner l’utilisation d’un produit non approuvé dans une posologie, pour une indication ou d’une manière autre que celle recommandée. Avant de prescrire tout produit, consultez toujours la plus récente monographie. La série de balados Écoutez votre cœur a reçu un soutien financier de Sanofi Canada.

title: Game Changer
description:
El pòdcast científic que posa sobre la taula algunes recerques científiques que canviaran la manera en com veiem el món. Un pòdcast que pretén fer reflexionar sobre les conseqüències que tindrien i l'impacte que causarien en la nostra vida les noves tècniques que es poden arribar a desenvolupar.

En aquestes gravacions es parlarà sobre la implantació de cèl·lules mare en el món de la reproducció assistida i les implicacions ètiques i morals que això comportaria, entrevistes amb professionals sobre les cèl·lules mare i molt més!

No et perdis ni un episodi del 'Game Changer' per estar al corrent d'algunes de les innovacions més pioneres en el món de la recerca científica.

title: The Social Brain
description: The place where society and biology meet. Conversations exploring the evolution and function of the human brain and the social pressures that shaped it into what it is today.
author_name: Taylor Guthrie and Andrew Cooper Sansone

title: VIDA
description:
¿Cómo es la vida de una persona que ve de frente a la muerte todos los días? ¿Qué siente un cirujano oncólogo cuando está en la mesa de operaciones? ¿Qué pasa en la vida cotidiana de un doctor? ¿Qué preguntas le harías TÚ a un cirujano?
Esto es VIDA, el podcast de DAVID CABA en el que platicamos sobre el pensamiento científico, las ciencias de la salud y su interacción con la vida diaria. 
Con su experiencia, el doctor Caba nos habla de medicina, cáncer, cirugías, deporte de alto rendimiento, espiritualidad, salud pública, música, literatura, filosofía y mucho más.
¡Bienvenidos, esto es VIDA!

title: Creciendo Con Caro
description: Persiguiendo avances de la ciencia que nos ayuda a vivir más y mejor. Discusiones sobre biogerontología y conversaciones sobre enseñanzas de la vida.

title: 123inclusie - 4 Talkshows
description: Kinderen en jongeren met een beperking vinden moeilijk aansluiting bij leeftijdsgenoten in de vrijetijds-sfeer. Nochtans zit hier maatschappelijke en emotionele winst in voor alle partijen. 123inclusie wil begeleiders in de opvang, leiders en animatoren ondersteunen in de motivatie en het proces om kinderen en jongeren met een beperking warm te onthalen en goed te begeleiden.  In de reeks van 4 talkshows over inclusie, focussen we telkens op een specifiek deelthema: Buitenschoolse Kinderopvang, Jeugdverenigingen, Sportclubs en Begeleiders met een beperking. Op het eind van elke show maakt Beno Schraepen, auteur van het boek 'Excluses' kanttekeningen bij de verhalen.

title: The Black Hole
description: The Black Hole is a new podcast that will venture into the minds and hearts of the masses via two thought experts: Sancho D. Bayleaf and Doggie Boy J. Listen as the Bayleaf and the Boy outthink so called “Scientist” and “Doctors” by digging the sediment out of the woolly grundle of life and death and life again (The afterlife) and put it under a microscope and project the findings on a jumbotron (metaphorically). Hear the bigger picture and absorb every facet of yours and you neighbor’s mind.
author_name: Sancho D. Bayleaf & Doggie Boy J.

title: Not Your Doc Podcast
description: Dr Charles Tadros, along with his cohost Vanessa Diederichsen, brings you the Not Your Doc podcast, a mental health and wellness program that dives into some of the most commonly misunderstood aspects of the mental health landscape. Presented by Midwest Institute for Hearts and Minds, this podcast covers a variety of general medical and mental health topics and is for informational purposes only. For questions please contact us at notyourdocpod@gmail.com.

description: 简介：我们是三位在读生物医学女博士，坐标北欧，本着科学态度探讨科研玄学，采用摆烂策略探索知识边界，偶尔沉迷八卦，时常认真搞笑，始终专注个人演技提升。此节目尺度较宽，信息量较大，笑声过于频繁，请择情收听。如果大龄未婚女性有意见，也请出门左转，不送。

Wir besprechen alles rund um Pop-Culture, Musik, Kunst, Psychologie, Gesundheit, Sport, Philosophie und obendrauf gibt es Anekdoten aus unserem Leben. 

Zu Ehren von unserem Papa.

description:
Making Therapy Better brings together some of the top minds in psychotherapy as well as everyday clinicians to talk about where the field is headed and how we can achieve better mental health care for everyone. 

www.makingtherapybetter.com

title: A4LI H-SPAN Podcast
description: Our Podcast highlights notable figures within the longevity field. The goal is to create social and political action around the issues of combating age-related chronic conditions and increasing our number of healthy, disease-free years!

title: Hippo & Friends type 1 diabetesfonds podcast
description:
Welkom bij de Hippo & Friends podcast. 

In deze podcast behandelen we thema’s die belangrijk zijn voor mensen met type 1 diabetes. Type 1 diabetes is een chronische auto-immuunziekte die ongeveer 50 000 Belgen treft. Met het Hippo & Friends type 1 diabetesfonds creëren we meer bewustzijn, dragen we bij tot projecten voor meer levenskwaliteit en steunen we wetenschappelijk onderzoek.

description: The Qualia Research Institute (QRI.org) is a California 501(c)(3) non-profit research group studying consciousness in a consistent, meaningful, and rigorous way. title: The Science Lab
description:
The Science Lab was created in 2022 in order to give students open access to science learning made by students. All episodes are properly sourced with the references in the show notes and have been created in the spirit of sharing well researched knowledge beyond just the scientific community.

All opinions expressed are those of Helen Werner or the student authors and do not necessarily reflect the views of Beloit College.

title: Medical Rewrites

Medical Rewrites is the podcast that rewrites movie scenes with evidence-based medicine. Come for the clinical pearls, stay for the tangents.

This podcast will analyze movies with medical plot points that fall short of best practices. Each episode will discuss a movie medical error, do a deep dive on the topic, then rewrite the scene or dialogue.

Schedule: Q14 days on Wednesday

Guest experts: PRN

description:
In this program, the international 3 Time Top Number One Bestseller Author Gisbert Reuter, an award-winning Creative Director and Mentor & Advisor to 6-, 7- and 8-fig business owners shows you how to use Quantum Leap Strategies to create better results faster.

Gisbert has helped more than 10,000 people in numerous live and online events, enjoy a better quality of life, more joy and fun, and in turn, have much less stress and achieve results they never thought possible.

title: SHARKS
description: A deep water exploration of our planet's coolest predator. Tune in for wacky info about your favorite species of shark delivered by special celebrity guests.

title: Where They Are Now And Where We Will Follow
description: This show is to highlight Elon University alumni's post-grad accomplishments pertaining to the field of biology. Each Episode contains stories of alumni and advice on grad school, internships, post-grad life, studying tips, unwinding, scientific discoveries, and much more.

description: En este podcast preguntas ñoñas, divulgamos filosofía y ciencia, desde matemáticas, física, química, biología, ciencias sociales, ambientales, geografía y un poco de historia, todo con una actitud positiva, y en modo de aprender. Queremos, promover la curiosidad entre nuestro público, la discusión y método dialéctico para resolución de problemas.

title: The Silly Salamander Scientist
description: In this series, join me as I break down current topics from all fields of science from biology to physics, mathematics to engineering. I discuss issues related to science and the behind the scenes of academia and research.

title: Jugend fragt... Der Podcast
description:
Land der Berge, Land am Strome, Land der Schnitzel, Land der Walzer, Land der Hidden Champions, zukunftsreich. Doch wie zukunftsreich ist Österreich noch? 

Jugend fragt.. Der Podcast
Ein ganzer Podcast der Generation Z gewidmet. 

In 15 Minuten reden Christoph Bartos und seine Gäste über die Zukunft, Präsenz und Vergangenheit aus der Sicht der Jugend.

title: DNA&
description:
Unlock the secrets of the genomics revolution with the "DNA&" podcast! Join Imperial College scientists Hannah & Angelos to explore the impact of DNA on personalised healthcare. Designed for non-experts and sponsored by the UK Genetics Society.

Music by Auburn Jam Music LTD www.auburnjam.co.uk and artwork by Nikos Kabasele https://www.facebook.com/Kabasele.Nikos

title: Prehospital Care Research Forum
description:
The UCLA Center for Prehospital Care established the Prehospital Care Research Forum at UCLA in 1992 in cooperation with Jems Communications. The mission? To promote, educate and disseminate prehospital research conducted at all provider levels to advance and challenge the future of EMS.

This podcast is intended for healthcare professionals only. Speaker disclosures are available in each episode’s notes. The views and opinions expressed in this program are those of the speakers and do not necessarily reflect the views or positions of any entities they represent. Some information contained herein may cite the use of an unapproved product in a dosage, for an indication, or in a manner other than recommended. title: R-Academy
description:
The R-Academy podcast provides a platform for the democratization of information about highly localized and niche topics. Its host, Robert Contofalsky, firmly believes in the importance of “Open-Access” like platforms where conversations about psychology, history, and science do not have barriers or paywalls behind them. The future of our society depends on the information that we are given at the time, and he believes that this podcast would be a contribution to this overall goal.

The topics discussed on this podcast will start where Robert has the most outreach: academia. He has maintained good relations with many professors and, thus, will begin by conversing with professors in Psychology and history, eventually expanding outwards. However, the “limited” faculty list is not a defect of the podcast, these are world-class scholars that he will be talking to, and the conversations will be nothing short of engaging and insightful. Here is a list of topics that will be covered:

  • The nature of consciousness, language, and communication
  • The Psychology of personality, pain, neuroscience, and Culture
  • The heritability of behaviour and intelligence, and its societal implications
  • Medieval history, translational history; the nature of writing
  • The Cold War and American history

This podcast will concentrate on academic affairs for the time being, with the hope of expanding outwards into more niche domains of scholarly topics. The potential for topics on this podcast will be infinite as professors are never done talking about their work, and that is the beauty of this podcast, is that it will allow the listeners to understand the work of top-shelf experts in a digestible format, and give them the opportunity to continue their curiosities in the topics that are discussed on this podcast.

In sum, the purpose of this podcast is for the host to act like a tourist in the minds and workspace of his guests; it is a zone that is free of judgment, and its primary focus is inquiry.

title: The Paraqua Podcast

In this exciting new podcast we interview scientists from all around the world and learn more about their work in the fields of aquatic and marine ecology and how their research is shaping the world we live in.

The ParAqua podcast was funded by COST, the European Cooperation in Science and Technology and is a product of the ParAqua Action. If you are interested in joining the Action or just want to know more please go to www.paraqua- cost.eu

The podcast is produced by Joe Money and Serena Rasconi and the Science Communication Coordinator is Ana Gavrilović. If you have any questions or want to get in touch to discuss your research in aquatic or marine ecology please email joe.money@amu.edu.pl

Belief is one half of our information. The other half is knowledge. Belief is what we each accept without proof. Knowledge is what we can prove to each other with independent facts.

Because no one knows everything, we depend on our belief systems to fill in the gaps of information. Science is the best belief system for better information because it requires the simplest belief - that the universe exists with constant properties, and the scientific method is the best way to discover them.
